title: Free Speech Champions, Inaya Folarin Iman Q&A
description:
What are the limits to free speech, and how can we create a culture of generative dialogue? Free Speech Champions is a new organisation launched by Inaya Folarin Iman. 

In this dialogue and Q&A with David Fuller and the Rebel Wisdom audience, they discuss the complexities of the topic.

Free Speech Champions: https://freespeechchampions.com/

To join Q&As like this one, check out: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
